name: Charting a Course
description: Learn how to navigate your spacecraft between planets. Master the art of fleet movement to expand your empire.

story.briefing: Commander, your Battle Cruiser awaits orders. Spacecraft can travel between planets, allowing you to project power across the galaxy. Today you will learn to navigate your fleet to a new destination.
story.objective: Navigate your Battle Cruiser to another planet in the system.
story.victory: Excellent navigation, Commander! Your Battle Cruiser has arrived at its destination. Remember: navigation costs 10 fuel per jump, and travel is instantaneous. Use this to position your forces strategically.

tutorialSteps.text: Commander, you have a Battle Cruiser stationed at your home planet. Click on your planet to see its details.
See the 'Navigate' button? This opens the Navigation Panel for any spacecraft at this planet. Click it now.
The Navigation Panel shows your spacecraft's current location and available fuel. Fuel is consumed from your planet's stockpile.
Each jump costs 10 fuel. Below you see the available destinations. Click on the neutral planet to select it.
With your destination selected, click 'NAVIGATE' to send your Battle Cruiser on its way!

clickByClickRecipe.title: Fleet Navigation - Step by Step

steps.instruction: Click your home planet where the Battle Cruiser is stationed
steps.expectedResult: Planet Info panel opens showing spacecraft section

steps.instruction: Click the 'Navigate' button in the Planet Info panel
Check the 'Fuel Available' value in the panel
steps.expectedResult: Shows current fuel from planet's stockpile

steps.instruction: Click on the neutral planet in the destination list
steps.expectedResult: Destination is highlighted, NAVIGATE button activates
Spacecraft moves to destination, 10 fuel deducted

notes: Fuel is taken from the departure planet
Cannot navigate if fuel is insufficient
Battle Cruisers can carry up to 4 platoons
